metadata.title: ISO 42001 to AWS Services Mapping
metadata.author: Jose Ruiz-Vazquez
metadata.description: Comprehensive mapping of ISO/IEC 42001:2023 controls to AWS services

mappings.control_name: Understanding AI System Risks and Opportunities
mappings.control_description: Organization shall determine risks and opportunities related to AI systems

aws_services.implementation: Monitor ML models for data drift, model quality degradation, and bias detection to identify risks in production AI systems
aws_services.control_support: Continuous monitoring and alerting on model performance and data quality

aws_services.implementation: Centralized security findings and compliance checks across AWS resources used for AI/ML workloads
aws_services.control_support: Risk identification and security posture assessment

aws_services.implementation: Monitor AI system performance metrics, set alarms for anomalies, and track operational risks
aws_services.control_support: Real-time visibility into AI system health and performance

mappings.control_description: Organization shall determine documented information necessary for effectiveness of AI management system

aws_services.implementation: Store training data, model artifacts, and documentation with versioning, lifecycle policies, and encryption
aws_services.control_support: Secure, versioned storage for AI system documentation and data

aws_services.implementation: Centralized data governance for AI training data with fine-grained access controls and data catalog
aws_services.control_support: Data governance, lineage tracking, and access management

aws_services.implementation: Metadata management and data discovery for AI/ML datasets
Automated discovery and classification of sensitive data in training datasets
aws_services.control_support: Data privacy and sensitive data identification

mappings.control_description: Assess potential impacts of AI systems on individuals, society, and environment

aws_services.implementation: Detect bias in training data and models, generate explainability reports for impact assessment
aws_services.control_support: Bias detection, fairness metrics, and model explainability

aws_services.implementation: Automate evidence collection for impact assessment processes and compliance audits
aws_services.control_support: Audit trail and compliance evidence management

aws_services.implementation: Document model characteristics, intended use, performance metrics, and ethical considerations

mappings.control_description: Ensure data quality, relevance, and suitability for AI system purposes

aws_services.implementation: Data quality profiling, cleansing, and normalization for ML training data
Visual data preparation and quality checks for ML workflows
aws_services.control_support: Data quality validation and feature engineering

aws_services.implementation: High-quality data labeling with built-in quality controls and validation
aws_services.control_support: Training data quality and labeling accuracy

aws_services.implementation: Define and monitor data quality rules, detect anomalies in data pipelines
aws_services.control_support: Automated data quality monitoring and validation

mappings.control_description: Establish processes for AI system design, development, and acquisition

aws_services.implementation: End-to-end ML development platform with built-in security, governance, and MLOps capabilities
Automated CI/CD pipelines for ML model training and deployment with approval gates
aws_services.control_support: Controlled and auditable model deployment process

aws_services.implementation: Define, orchestrate, and manage ML workflows with versioning and lineage tracking
Version control for ML code, models, and configurations

mappings.control_description: Verify and validate AI systems meet specified requirements and perform as intended

aws_services.implementation: Continuous validation of model quality, data drift, and model drift in production
aws_services.control_support: Automated model validation and performance monitoring

aws_services.implementation: Track, compare, and evaluate ML experiments and model performance
Orchestrate automated testing workflows for AI systems with error handling

mappings.control_description: Operate AI systems in accordance with intended use and monitor performance

aws_services.implementation: Scalable, managed model hosting with auto-scaling and blue/green deployments
Monitor AI system metrics, logs, and set alarms for operational issues
Distributed tracing for AI/ML applications to identify performance bottlenecks
Event-driven automation for AI system operations and incident response

mappings.control_description: Implement appropriate human oversight of AI system operation

aws_services.implementation: Human review workflows for ML predictions requiring oversight or low-confidence scenarios
Generate explainability reports to support human understanding and oversight
Workflow orchestration with manual approval steps for critical AI decisions
aws_services.control_support: Human approval gates in AI workflows

mappings.control_description: Provide transparency about AI system capabilities, limitations, and operation

aws_services.implementation: Document and share model information including intended use, limitations, and performance
Generate bias reports and feature importance explanations for stakeholders
Document AI system operational procedures and runbooks

mappings.control_description: Implement information security controls for AI systems and data

aws_services.implementation: Fine-grained access control for AI/ML resources using roles and policies
Encryption key management for data at rest and in transit for AI workloads
Automated sensitive data discovery and protection in AI training data
Secure storage and rotation of API keys, credentials used by AI systems
Private connectivity between VPC and AI/ML services without internet exposure

mappings.control_description: Protect privacy of individuals in AI system data processing

aws_services.implementation: Identify and protect personally identifiable information (PII) in training data
Cell-level and column-level security for sensitive data in data lakes
Data masking and anonymization for privacy-preserving ML
Collaborative analytics without sharing underlying sensitive data

mappings.control_description: Manage incidents related to AI system operation and failures

aws_services.implementation: Incident response automation, escalation, and post-incident analysis for AI systems
Automated alerting on AI system anomalies and failures
Multi-channel incident notification and escalation
Audit logs for incident investigation and root cause analysis

mappings.control_description: Maintain logs of AI system activities for audit and compliance

aws_services.implementation: Comprehensive API logging for all AWS AI/ML service interactions
Centralized log aggregation and retention for AI system operations
Automated evidence collection and audit report generation
Immutable log storage for regulatory compliance

mappings.control_description: Manage AI systems throughout their lifecycle from development to decommissioning

aws_services.implementation: Centralized model versioning, approval workflows, and deployment tracking
End-to-end ML workflow automation with lineage tracking
Standardized, approved ML infrastructure and project templates
Track configuration changes and compliance of AI/ML resources

mappings.control_description: Manage risks associated with third-party AI systems, components, and services

aws_services.implementation: Curated ML models and algorithms from verified vendors with security scanning
Pre-built, tested ML solutions and models from AWS and partners
Access compliance reports and agreements for AWS services
Security assessment of third-party integrations and dependencies

mappings.control_description: Ensure continuity of AI system operations during disruptions

aws_services.implementation: Automated backup of ML models, training data, and configurations
Geographic redundancy for critical AI system data and models
Fast recovery of AI system infrastructure and applications
High availability model endpoints across availability zones

mappings.control_description: Monitor and measure AI management system performance

aws_services.implementation: Custom dashboards for AI system KPIs and performance metrics
Business intelligence and analytics for AI system performance data
Track and analyze costs of AI/ML workloads for ROI assessment
Automated model performance monitoring with baseline comparisons

mappings.control_description: Conduct internal audits of AI management system

aws_services.implementation: Automated audit evidence collection with pre-built and custom frameworks
Automated compliance checking against AI governance policies
Anomaly detection in AWS API usage for audit investigations
Security investigation and analysis for audit findings
